body_html:
Rebasing is a good idea.

Your errors come from pylint and buildifier. I'll paste them here:

FAIL: buildifier found errors and/or warnings in above BUILD files.
buildifier suggested the following changes:
3699d3698
< "layers/maxout.py",
3701a3701

    "layers/maxout.py",

3793d3792
<

This means your source files need to be sorted in the BUILD rule.

Then the pylint errors are

pylint took 116 s

FAIL: Found 39 non-whitelited pylint errors:
tensorflow/python/layers/maxout_test.py:37: [W0311(bad-indentation), ] Bad indentation. Found 4 spaces, expected 2

to fix these use 2-space indentation instead of 4-space indentation
